about_the_game:
* If the gamepad is not responding, go to [Controller Options], [Steam Input Per-Game] and select [Forced Off] or select the [Gamepad With Camera Controls] layout.

* We do not guarantee that the game will run on devices with heavy 3D graphics.

* There is a trial version available on the official website, so please use it.

Cat's dungeon crawler.

A turn-based dungeon RPG in the traditional style of a Wizclone.

We've reviewed some of the more troublesome aspects of the game to make it easier for beginners to play.

Of course, it's a game that even long-time Wiz-Clone fans will enjoy, and it's a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Love the back of a cat's head.

The back of a cat's head is something you can look at all the time.

The form of Miwaku is always on display in this game.

You can also import your cat's photo, so you can enjoy the happiness of checking how the cats are doing even in the game.

Almost non-violent! HP is a heart point.

When the player's adventurer (the alter ego of the player) runs out of HP (Heart Points), it becomes a "Sulking".

If this happens, she will not be able to do anything.

If it fails to revive, it becomes a "Ignore".

If you fail to resurrect from that point, you will not be lost, but you will be a Ignore for a long time.

Always be careful not to let your HP drop to zero.

Let's send kitten to the human's house.

After adventuring for a while, you will be able to recruit kitten as a member.

Your mission is to send kitten to the human's family.

But along the way, there are many challenges awaiting you.

You'll have to deal with all kinds of wild animals, and even your eternal rival, the doggy.

And for kitten, who has safely made it to human's home, even more challenges await...!

More information can be found on the official website.

How to play, characteristics of each race, and a list of spells are available in the "How to Play" section of the homepage.

You can also play the browser version as a free trial version, so if you want to know what kind of game it is before buying the paid version, please visit the homepage.

You can import the saved data from the demo version to the paid app version by using the "Save Data Password".

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 660M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Nyaz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1909 later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Microsoft Edge
